problem.markdown:
>>Will it be more difficult to hold your arm out horizontally and support a book near your hand or near your shoulder?<< (x) It will be more difficult to hold a book near your hand ( ) It will be more difficult to hold a book near your shoulder ( ) There will be no difference between holding a book near my hand or shoulder.
[explanation] It will be more difficult to hold your arm horizontal with a book near your hand than near your shoulder since the distance between your hand and the point of support (your shoulder) will be greater. The further a weight (in this case the weight of a book) is from the point of support the greater the tendency of that weight to cause a rotation, which must be resisted. [explanation]
